metadata.title: CVE-2021-38504 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: When interacting with an HTML input element's file picker dialog withwebkitdirectory set, a use-after-free could have resulted, leading tomemory corruption and a potentially exploitable crash. This vulnerabilityaffects Firefox < 94, Thunderbird < 91.3, and Firefox ESR < 91.3.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
